metadataAttributes.Title: Meta React Native Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Become a cross-platform mobile app developer. Learn in-demand skills for developing reliable, scalable and user-friendly mobile apps for multiple operating systems, such as iOS and Android.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Web Development, React (Web Framework), HTML and CSS, Mobile Development, JavaScript, Test-Driven Development, Front-End Web Development, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Linux, Bash (Unix Shell), Github, Version Control,
